text: The 2004–05 FIS Cross-Country World Cup was the 24th official World Cup season in cross-country skiing for men and ladies. The season began in Düsseldorf, Germany on 23 October 2004 and was concluded in Falun, Sweden on 20 March 2005. The overall winners were Marit Bjørgen and Axel Teichmann. == Calendar == === Men === {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 90%" |- !width="20" | !width="120"| Venue !width="140"| Discipline !width="110"| Date !width="200"| Winner !width="200"| Second !width="200"| Third |- !
